nodeList.loreText: Eterra will guide you, and her avatars will keep you safe.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Summon a spriggan that casts spells to attack your enemies and a has a healing aura that grants 50% increased health regeneration. Resistant to powerful area attacks.

The spriggan counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Your Spriggan's Summon Vine ability has a shorter cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Your Spriggan has [30%] increased cooldown recovery speed per point for summon vine

node.description: Your Spriggan can summon {Vines}, melee minions who poison enemies they attack, but your spriggan has reduced cast speed.
node.nodeDescription: Your Spriggan has 10% reduced cast speed, but can summon stationary vines which attack enemies with poison attacks.
